1617745493_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body:
Plead the Fifth (Amendment)
1. To refuse to testify against oneself in court, in accordance with the rights guaranteed by the Fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution. The alleged kingpin of the east coast drug cartel simply pled the Fifth after every question the prosecution put to him.
2. By extension, to refuse to answer a question or provide information, especially if doing so may incriminate or embarrass oneself. Just plead the Fifth if your mom asks where you've been all night! A: "So, I hear things got pretty messy at the bar last night." B: "Yeah, I'm going to have to plead the Fifth Amendment on that one!"

Then I don't remember or 

I don't recall

and better

I feel sick / tired / hungry, and can't concentrate on your questions.

I need medical attention

where is my lawyer?

but the day we can round up all fbi agents and kill them all will be a great day... all.

I do too believe to have way more free speech in china than anywhere in the west.

One I believe that you can say anything in China, but with the proper forms.

For example, rather than go in the street about a perceived corrupt official in a city, it's way simpler to inform Beijing discretely about the situation and let the process follow it's course.

Furthermore, for me the fundamental difference is the law, in the sense that in China there are laws, regulating the whole, not like in the usa...

In practice, Weibo follows state orders, and in the usa the us federal gov follows twitter and co orders.

Fundamentally it comes to the fact that CCP are Chinese Patriots seeking better days for China as a nation, meanwhile in the west, it's constant betrayal for various ideologies, from pedophilia, to serfdom, to a global one world gov, to what ever new idea will infect the mind, but it will be everything, but the bill of rights.

However, at one point, it will be appropriate to COUNTER STRIKE.

Thanks for explaining your point of view. I agree with you, but have to differentiate two situation.

1. pre war. In this case no problem, they say what they want, and the better argument wins, in a fully uncensored space, aka you can say too kill the nazis (and argument it), fair.

2. war, in this case the nazis are only allowed free speech in the area they control, and as soon as they lose them they die, as the others forces.

Now my opinion, or of anyone with still a brain, is that all the american msn networks are enemy combatants and that we are at war with them. As such it's only natural that they are hunted down and executed.

I understand your reticences in kill their children, in some kind of whiteknight fashion. I disagree.

First, the american and western at large so called free press, was for example in the case of france, killed during ww1. Exactly, it's when Parisian reporters decided to visit for themselves the front lines of ww1. And where shocked by the cheer stupidity and massacre that french troops endured.

Following their return to Paris, the french army / state, decided to impose "the censorship". Since then, I am not aware of very large media organization, working as the American Founders envisionned, and or according as the 4th pillar of the american republic, as the medias love to portray themselves.

We are reaching 20 years of occupation in afghanistan, almost the same in iraq, we still don't know what happen on 911. janet yellen gets 7 millions as speaking fees, or why ben bernanke moved everyone on variable mortgage rate before exploding the interests rate on those contracts, we still have no justice regarding pedogate with epstein (or only 1 arrest with weinstein) while they gazlight us on floyd (while briana taylor or the girl from flint michigan are censored). Not a single word on therapeutics regarding covid, even basics like nutritional imbalance or vit.c or garlic.
Do I need to mention, the bitleashed email of hitlary, benghazi, or the spread of GMO and EMF pollution? Or maybe the events surrounding nov. 4th 2020, with the full on election theft from pedotrump? A word on AG Barr or secretary Acosta or maybe Conway friendships, maybe roger stone ones?

If you want to perish for an ideology your free to do so. For now, in this regard the situation is fully in control in PRC. bring your legions if you wish, but if already you can't defeat your own ideologies or simple pedos, what chances do you really have, in the unrestricted fields of war? very little, and less at each passing day.

Thank you for your message,

and yes their kiddos die, so that the cost of the betrayals of those press, is clear and makes a great history, when we the people said enough with the betrayals (nohaid laws, uno / global agendas , charter / or the GSA (guide stone agenda, population reduction, white genocide / or the feodal pedo rule). And killing their offspring, as unjust as it may appears, is to be weighted by the fact that those MSNers sought to kill OURS. 

we bring equality, the hard way. I understand that the question of killing their children, may still be open, but them, is undebatable.
